name: Joon Health
headline: Pediatric digital therapeutic for the +100M families in the US
description:
Joon is an integrated pediatric digital health platform for kids, starting with behavior disorders like ADHD, autism, anxiety, and depression. In Joon, kids access a game-based digital therapeutic where they level up when they do real-life behaviors that are managed by parents and clinicians. 

Over the next 10 years, we plan on being the first-line vertically integrated digital treatment for pediatric behavior disorders, leveraging the first of its kind technology to drive behavior change.

founders.name: Isaac Eaves, Founder
founders.description: Isaac Eaves is the co-founder and CEO of Joon which he started with Brad Brenner and Kevin Bunarjo in 2021. Isaac focuses on managing the product and strategy of Joon. Having ADHD and having spent 10,000+ hours playing games as a kid, he's passionate about creating a game that kids love, but that also helps them achieve their potential in real-life. Isaac earned degrees in Computer Science and Business Administration from UC Berkeley.

founders.name: Brad Brenner, Founder
founders.description: Brad Brenner is the co-founder and Chief Operating Officer of Joon, which he started with Isaac Eaves and Kevin Bunarjo in 2021. Brad kicked off his entrepreneurial journey at the age of 7 and has started 4 businesses prior to Joon. At Joon, he takes point on all things operational from product development, user research, growth & marketing to financial planning and forecasting. Originally from Romania, Brad graduated from UC Berkeley with a degree in Business Administration.

founders.name: Kevin Bunarjo, Founder
founders.description: Kevin Bunarjo is an engineer at Joon. As a kid, Kevin spent countless hours playing video games (Minecraft, Runescape, Pokemon, Tetris being the top games) and hopes he can use Joon to leverage the fun of games to motivate kids to be productive in real life. Kevin graduated from UC Berkeley with degrees in Computer Science and Business Administration. Although he lives in the Bay Area now, he is originally from Jakarta, Indonesia.

# The only parent training system built to increase parent buy-in and treatment follow-through
###### Access 100+ parent training resources and seamlessly send them to caregivers, while effortlessly collecting at-home behavior data through a parent-friendly mobile app.
[Try for free](https://joonhealth.co/</get-started>)[Schedule a call](https://joonhealth.co/</company/get-started-clinician>)
###### Built in Partnership With:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/65f0f485b89cfcd9e571de65_image%201089.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/65f0f4860cb8628fba661a87_image%201094.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/65f10bf499398a7e2098283b_image%201092.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/65f0f17c526a9f4954be77c4_Joon%20Health%20Hero.png)
## Trusted by health systems, clinics, and families around the world
21
**k+**
Families
110
**+**
Clinics
## Enhance clinical quality and time efficiency
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/662b102255950e4333e7970a_automation.png)
Automate parent training program setup
Spend less than 5 minutes creating a parent training program with the most relevant videos, worksheets and strategies
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/662b0ff1961466f0f064bb4c_communication.png)
Engage parents outside of sessions
Use a mobile-friendly digital app to automate parent training reminders and start collecting ABC data when no clinician is present
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/662b0f966b730669dd1f1e70_currency-notes%20\(1\).png)
Save 4-6hrs/wk of non-billable hours
By fully automating parent training, each clinician can save several hours per week in prep-work, resulting in more available billable time
Interested in seeing how much incremental revenue your clinic could really make?
[Calculate Revenue Potential](https://joonhealth.co/</bcba-tools/roi-calculator>)
## How Joon Health works
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/662b113143386096fcea5eb5_checklist.png)
**Step 1**
Create a custom parent training program in minutes
### Access 100+ unique parent training resources
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/66b2d1a3cbd1e8462637c05e_Step%201-min.webp)
We first help clinicians create a parent training program from our complete caregiver resource library using evidence-based programs
[Try for free ->](https://joonhealth.co/</get-started>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/66b2d1a3cbd1e8462637c05e_Step%201-min.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/662b11224628a60fe798e6e9_touch.png)
**Step 2**
We directly integrate the parent goals into an easy-to-use mobile app
### Engage parents through a parent-friendly mobile app
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/66b2d18e7840453f278dd4c8_Step%202-min.webp)
Through the app experience, parent goals, tasks and worksheets become seamlessly integrated into their daily routines. We do all the prompting and reminding so you can just start collecting data in real-time.
[Try for free ->](https://joonhealth.co/</get-started>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/662b10eb904aefc61277ab31_controller.png)
**Step 3**
Start collecting ABC data and parent progress in real-time
### Track parent progress and start understanding behavior triggers and trends
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/667b94e31ebec395e786810e_Group%201171276636.png)
As parents become accustomed to using the program and logging incidents at home without a clinician present, clinicians will be able to see exactly what triggered target behaviors and which response strategies worked by the parent. 
[Try for free ->](https://joonhealth.co/</get-started>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/667d92c4b41910b1f36bf625_Incident%20Logs%20-%203.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/662b10c3f89fbabb62513465_insight.png)
**Step 4**
Automate progress tracking towards parent goals
### Save time reporting parent progress
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/66b2d12b529d8b35d346a9b6_Step%204-min.webp)
As treatment progresses, we chart everything and help clinicians monitor progress towards parent goals and mastery criteria in order to update progress notes and submit insurance reports. We also provide data exports and flexibility to set up custom integrations into your existing practice management software.
[Try for free ->](https://joonhealth.co/</get-started>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/662b10eb904aefc61277ab31_controller.png)
**Step 5**
Add on a positive reinforcement and token economy system
### Gamify the experience for children
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/662be2f93082cccc4aee5857_Group%201171276634.webp)
Once parents are engaged and making progress, take things to the next level. Optional for clients, clinicians can enable client access to a video game to help reinforce positive behavior at home using a system that is very simple and easy for the parent to adopt and follow-through, driving further parent engagement and overall independence.
[Try for free ->](https://joonhealth.co/</get-started>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/662be2f93082cccc4aee5857_Group%201171276634.webp)
## Multiple Clinical Studies, including an RCT with NYU
[View Research](https://joonhealth.co/</research>)
## See what clinicians and families have to say
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/663008ae7224ff5d3d531376_1653094404039.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/662fff0830af10b04a7c0db3_628a5d325efc21a526a74793_5-stars.png)
**Anabel Fernandez**
Clinical Director & BCBA
 _The most pressing problem for me as a clinical director is parent adherence_ _& getting parents involved with the treatment protocols. Holding the parents and children accountable which is exactly what Joon does. Parents can be very disconnected from the treatment process which all leads to the patient not improving in a timely manner._
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/663009298b063672ac1eb30b_Picture1.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/664244615304655f3b0ac469_Hallie.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/662fff0830af10b04a7c0db3_628a5d325efc21a526a74793_5-stars.png)
**Hallie Ertel, Ph.D.**
Clinical Director & BCBA
 _Prior to Joon, data was very variable because of delayed reinforcers and inconsistency from the parent. One thing I absolutely love about Joon is that it puts things in the parent’s hands and involved the parent. This has really upped the treatment integrity and accountability on the parent. It can be too common for parents to rely on ABA for techs to do everything._
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/6642450cfd1cdcabe29f06c0_atlantic.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/66300986e3e08c328280beba_download.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/662fff0830af10b04a7c0db3_628a5d325efc21a526a74793_5-stars.png)
**Dr. Carrie Jackson**
Practice Owner & LCP
 _I'm constantly on the lookout for new tools that can help my patients and Joon is one that has been absolutely life-changing. It's extremely easy to set up, manage, and monitor. The insights that the platform tracks outside of session helps me stay 100% informed and best prepare for follow-up sessions with families, ultimately leading to significantly faster discharge rates._
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/66300a05e3e08c3282813c50_Picture2-min.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/663006b1ee7ccf9736640169_641258a9b43beb16eba89788_4.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/662fff0830af10b04a7c0db3_628a5d325efc21a526a74793_5-stars.png)
**Brandi Johnson**
Parent of 2 ASD Children
 _Before Joon, I felt overwhelmed trying to best support my son's ASD and keep him working towards his treatment goals. Joon turned our struggles into a fun, rewarding process that my son looks forward to every day. I've seen a huge improvement in his behavior and his ability to do skills independently. Plus, being able to view my progress as a parent and understand how far I've come has been extremely motivating._
# Join us to better support the next generation of families
[Try for free](https://joonhealth.co/</get-started>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64432c80733e8376217b48b9/65f0f0894f9ff607587cf303_Joon%20Health%20Purple.png)
Transforming pediatric behavioral health care, one family at a time.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Joon Health**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from the vibrant tech hub of San Francisco, Joon Health is set on a mission to revolutionize pediatric behavioral healthcare for over 100 million families across the U.S. Initially part of Y Combinator’s Winter 2022 cohort, Joon has quickly carved its niche as an integrated digital health platform tailored for children grappling with behavioral disorders such as ADHD, autism, anxiety, and depression.

**What is Joon Health?**

At its core, Joon is a game-based digital therapeutic platform that empowers children to engage in real-life behavioral improvements. Kids earn points and level up in a game while their progress is monitored by both parents and clinicians. This gamification of therapy not only makes the process enjoyable for kids but also fosters a collaborative approach involving caregivers.

**Vision for the Future**

Over the next decade, Joon envisions becoming the go-to digital treatment solution for pediatric behavioral disorders. They’re leveraging a first-of-its-kind technology designed to drive significant behavioral change and enhance treatment adherence.

**Current Features and Offerings**

Joon Health equips families with a variety of resources aimed at enhancing parental engagement and overall treatment effectiveness, including:

- **Parent Resource Library**: Access to over 100 training materials to guide caregivers.
- **Data Collection Mobile App**: A user-friendly platform for parents to log behaviors conveniently.
- **Goal Tracking**: Automated tools for monitoring progress toward specific treatment goals.
- **Token Economy System**: A setup that encourages children through rewards for positive behaviors.
- **AI Session Notes**: Automated note-taking to streamline communication between clinicians and families.
- **Free AI Tools**: Resources that save clinicians time on administrative tasks.

These features are rooted in evidence-based methodologies and aim to reinforce the vital role parents play in their child’s treatment journey.

**Why Joon Health Matters**

The platform addresses a pressing problem in clinical settings—parent adherence to treatment protocols. By directly involving parents through intuitive tools and real-time data collection, Joon enhances treatment integrity and accountability. Clinicians can monitor progress more effectively, ultimately leading to better patient outcomes.

**Feedback from Clinicians and Families**

Clinicians are lauding Joon for its ability to bridge the gap between them and the families they serve. Parents, on the other hand, have found the platform transformative—turning what was once an overwhelming process into an engaging experience that children look forward to.

**Conclusion**

Joon Health is on a mission to fundamentally change how pediatric behavioral health is managed—transforming consultations into collaborations that genuinely involve families. If you're a parent navigating these challenges or a clinician looking to integrate a modern solution into your practice, Joon might just be what you need to level up your approach.

Curious to dive deeper? Check out their website at [Joon Health](https://joonhealth.co).
